label: Description
value: Tall neck with rounded knop and lip, 2 triple prism-cut rings; body has facet cutting from shoulders to neck, the rest plain, tapering sides, hole top and bottom.

label: Provenance
value: Delomosne and Son, Ltd., London; 1960: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Tall ovoid body on flat circular stepped base, tapered neck, scalloped lip with pouring spout, loop handle notched for thumb; bottom of vase has deep cut radiating flutes, alternate ones with small diamonds, sides cut with alternate vertical pillar and diamond flutes, neck with same, horizontal.

label: Provenance
value: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Round body cut with vertical flutes in graduated lengths, prismatic cutting above and below, with vertical flutes around lip, a star on bottom of base; domed cover with mushroom finial cut with star, sides cut with blazes of graduated lengths and short row vertical flutes at outer rim.

label: Provenance
value: R. McDonnell, Dublin; 1963: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Round body cut with vertical flutes in graduated lengths prismatic cutting above and below, with vertical flutes around lip, a star on bottom of base; domed cover with mushroom finial cut with vertical flutes at out rim.

label: Provenance
value: R. McDonnell, Dublin; 1963: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Drum-shaped bowl with scalloped edge, the base tapering to a flat bottom, tall stem with central knop, wide flat circular base cut on the bottom with raised flutes; sides of bowl cut with facets at the bottom, bands of prismatic cutting and small diamonds above, a wide band of interlocking loops surrounded by small diamonds and fan cutting.

label: Provenance
value: Delomosne and Son, Ltd., London; 1963: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Round bowl with large turned-over rim, sits on tall stem with central knop, high domed base with cut blazes at bottom edge; sides of bowl cut with double band of facets, a triple band of facets on over-turned rim; pontil mark bottom; glass dark clear.

label: Provenance
value: Cecil Davis Ltd., London; 1963: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Ovoid jar and cover on plain, short stem and square pedestal base all overs step cutting cover has notch for spoon. Mushroom finial with radial cutting.

value: H x diam.: 19 x 11 cm (7 1/2 x 4 5/16 in.)

label: Provenance
value: Cecil Davis, LTD, 3 Grosvenor St, New Bond St, London, W.I., purchased (7-24-63) by WPW.

value: Flat circular base with rounded bottom side, tall handle make up of five knops

label: Description
value: Bulbous body, ring of molded vertical fluting bottom carrying over onto bottom; engraved border with initials I B H; 3 triple neck rings, everted lips; molded mushroom shaped stopper, radially grooved; pontil mark bottom.

label: Provenance
value: W.G.T. Burne, London; 1963: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Tall straight-sided bow with wide turned-over rim and flat bottom spool stem on wide flat circular base; turned-over rim cut with all-over diamond pattern, notched at rim, band of strawberry diamonds center of side, prismatic band above, fluting below; glass slightly greenish.

label: Provenance
value: Howard Phillips, London; 1964: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description

value: Delomosne and Son, Ltd, London; 1964: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Ovoid body, long angled spout, large loop handle, cut pattern of small diamonds bottom of sides, above a row of tick pillar flutes, neck with 3 faceted prismatic rings; spout notched at edges, triangular thumbs piece cut at top of handle; that bottom cut with narrow radiating flutes.

label: Provenance
value: Delomosne and Son, Ltd; 1964: Walter Phelps Warren; 1986: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Large shallow circular bowl with scalloped edge, rim cut with fans, sides with undulating strawberry diamond pattern; base has waisted stem cut with prismatic rings; a band of strawberry diamonds above and a wide domed spreading foot with strawberry diamonds.

label: Description

label: Provenance
value: Cecil Davis, LTD. 3 Grosvenor St. New bond St. London, WI, (6-10-65) purchase by P. Warren.

Antrim, Ireland, " and a picture of the distillery marked "pure malt" surrounded by shamrocks; bottom cut with star; stopper mushroom-shaped with hexagonal faceting.

label: Description

label: Description
